text: John James Harrison (born 7 June 1961) is an English former professional footballer who played as a defender in the Football League for York City, and in non-League football for Leeman United and Osbaldwick. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from York Category:English footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:York City F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: John Harrison (footballer, born 1961)
